articles.title: Heath Streak: Former Zimbabwe captain & coach dies aged 49
articles.description: Former Zimbabwe captain and coach Heath Streak, who had been suffering from colon cancer, dies at the age of 49.
articles.content:
Heath Streak had been receiving treatment at a hospital in Johannesburg, South Africa

articles.author: C. Scott Brown
articles.title: Cricket now offers the ability to pay for multiple months and earn big discounts
articles.description: If you have the money to pay for a few months in advance, Cricket Wireless will now offer you substantial discounts.
articles.content:
• Cricket Wireless now offers discounts for individual subscribers who pay months in advance.
  • Depending on how far ahead you pay, you can earn up to $300 off your yearly charges.
